sprites_description.snake_head: Green snake head sprite facing right, pixel art style, square shape with eyes, used as leading segment
sprites_description.snake_body: Green snake body segment, pixel art style, square shape with scales pattern, used for middle segments
sprites_description.snake_tail: Green snake tail segment, pixel art style, square shape with tapered end, used as final segment

sprites_description.food_apple: Red apple sprite, pixel art style, round shape with green stem, collectible food item that spawns randomly
